mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(payment_result_amount), 0) AS payment_result_amount FROM ( SELECT 1 AS month UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9 UNION SELECT 10 UNION SELECT 11 UNION SELECT 12 ) AS months LEFT JOIN Payment ON MONTH(payment_date) = months.month GROUP BY months.month;

SELECT model.name as car_model , type.name as car_type , fuel.name as car_fuel , c.car_img , c.car_capacity , c.gear_type , c.car_hourprice , c.car_dayprice FROM car c LEFT JOIN Common model ON c.car_model = model.code LEFT JOIN Common fuel ON c.car_fuel = fuel.code LEFT JOIN Common type ON c.car_type = type.code WHERE c.car_number = #{car_number}
mapper.update: UPDATE car SET car_countReserve = car_countReserve + 1 WHERE car_number = #{car_number}
